attributes.action: lower the voting age to 16 in the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the present, at the age of 16 one can get married, have children, join the army and pay taxes, but they cannot vote and therefore do not have the same chances as other tax payers to be represented.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
